wikipedia_page.main: Alexander McIntosh (14 April 1916 – 1965) was a Scottish footballer who played as an inside forward in the Football League for Wolverhampton Wanderers, Birmingham City and Coventry City.

response: * Alex McIntosh (footballer, born 1923)  (1923-1998),  Scottish footballer, full back for Inverurie Loco, Dundee, Barrow and Carlisle United
